content: Investments ETF Asked by Gideon LimAsked on 06 Mar 2019Is the S & P 500 and ETFs dividend investments? Have read about it but don't know much. Where do I start investing for these? Just walk-in a bank to set up? Where do I begin? 1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

SKShabir KhanLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 07 Jun 2019First thing you want to so is set-up a brokerage account with the many brokers in Singapore, such as DBS Vickers, Maybank Kim Eng etc, all of the brokers have access to the U.S Market so choose them based on fees and other markets that you would like to invest in. This gives you access to buy the S&P 500 and many other ETFs listed in U.S market, you can invest them through the online websites that this brokerages have.1 comment1

GLGideon Lim26 Apr 2019Thanks. Will look at the options available.

Cheers!
